Operation 'SaveReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description lacks critical details about inputs (product ID, rating, title, content), authentication method specifics, and what the response contains. Missing information about side effects (review becomes visible to other shoppers). Added domain-specific context about ratings, product reviews, and visibility to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description:
Creates a single review. 
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only your `VtexidClientAutCookie` to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [Generating user tokens](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens#generating-a-user-token-with-the-vtex-io-cli) guide for more information.
data.summary_suggestion: Submit a product review with rating and content
data.description_suggestion: Creates a single product review with rating, title, and content. This operation allows shoppers to submit reviews for products in your store. Requires user authentication via VtexIdClientAutCookie token. The request body must include product ID, rating (typically 1-5 stars), review title, and review text. Returns the created review object with a unique review ID and timestamp. The review becomes immediately available for other shoppers to view.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't indicate what type of review or what information is required. Description lacks critical details about inputs (product ID, rating, title, content), authentication method specifics, and what the response contains. Missing information about side effects (review becomes visible to other shoppers). Added domain-specific context about ratings, product reviews, and visibility to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'GetProductRating' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. The current description lacks detail about what rating data is returned (e.g., average score, distribution). Added clarity about aggregated ratings and what the response contains to help AI agents understand the operation's output and use case.

data.current_description:
Retrieves the rating of a product.
 ## Permissions

 This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the aggregated rating information for a specified product, including the average rating score and rating distribution. Returns rating data that reflects all submitted reviews for the product. This endpoint does not require special permissions.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks detail about what rating data is returned (e.g., average score, distribution). Added clarity about aggregated ratings and what the response contains to help AI agents understand the operation's output and use case.

message: Operation 'DeleteReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_side_effects, missing_output_details. Original description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and what is returned. Added details about permanence, impact on product ratings, and response to help AI agents understand the consequences of this destructive operation.

data.current_description:
Deletes an existing review. 

 ## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a review by its ID. This operation removes the review from the system and updates the product's aggregated rating accordingly. The deletion is irreversible. Returns confirmation of successful deletion. This endpoint does not require special permissions.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks information about side effects (rating recalculation) and what is returned. Added details about permanence, impact on product ratings, and response to help AI agents understand the consequences of this destructive operation.

message: Operation 'EditReview' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description is too generic about what can be updated. Added specificity about updatable fields, support for partial updates, and clarified return value to help AI agents understand what modifications are possible and what response to expect.

data.current_description:
Updates the information of a review. 

## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing review's information including rating, title, and content. Accepts partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Returns the updated review object with all current information. This endpoint does not require special permissions.
data.reasoning: Original description is too generic about what can be updated. Added specificity about updatable fields, support for partial updates, and clarified return value to help AI agents understand what modifications are possible and what response to expect.

message: Operation 'GetalistofReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original description lacks context about pagination, filtering, and sorting options (8 parameters suggest rich query capabilities). Added details about available filters and what data is returned to help AI agents understand how to query reviews effectively and what to expect in responses.

data.current_description:
Retrieves a list of reviews related to a product.
## Permissions 

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of reviews with optional filtering and sorting capabilities. Supports filtering by product ID, rating, status, and other criteria. Returns review objects containing rating, title, content, author information, and submission date. Useful for displaying reviews in product pages or generating review reports. This endpoint does not require special permissions.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks context about pagination, filtering, and sorting options (8 parameters suggest rich query capabilities). Added details about available filters and what data is returned to help AI agents understand how to query reviews effectively and what to expect in responses.

message: Operation 'SaveMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks detail about input structure (array of reviews) and output (review IDs). Added clarity about required fields, batch processing benefits, and authentication requirements to help AI agents understand how to structure requests and handle responses.

data.current_description:
Creates multiple reviews for more than one product in a single operation.
## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3). 
 For authentication, you must generate and use only the Application Key and the Application Token to work with this endpoint. Refer to the [API authentication using application keys](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-application-keys) and [Generating internal application keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/application-keys--2iffYzlvvz4BDMr6WGUtet#generating-internal-application-keys) guide for more information.
data.description_suggestion: Creates multiple reviews for one or more products in a single batch operation. Accepts an array of review objects, each containing product ID, rating, title, content, and reviewer information. Returns confirmation of created reviews with their assigned review IDs. Requires Application Key and Application Token authentication. Useful for bulk importing reviews or programmatic review submission.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks detail about input structure (array of reviews) and output (review IDs). Added clarity about required fields, batch processing benefits, and authentication requirements to help AI agents understand how to structure requests and handle responses.

message: Operation 'DeleteMultipleReviews' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects, missing_output_details. Original description lacks critical details about input format (array of IDs), side effects (rating recalculation), and response format. Added specificity about batch input structure, permanence, impact on product ratings, and use cases to help AI agents understand the destructive nature and scope of this operation.

data.current_description:
Deletes multiple reviews at once. 

 ## Permissions
 
This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes multiple reviews in a single batch operation by providing an array of review IDs. This operation removes all specified reviews from the system and updates affected products' aggregated ratings accordingly. Returns confirmation of deleted review IDs. Deletions are irreversible. Useful for bulk moderation or cleanup operations. This endpoint does not require special permissions.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical details about input format (array of IDs), side effects (rating recalculation), and response format. Added specificity about batch input structure, permanence, impact on product ratings, and use cases to help AI agents understand the destructive nature and scope of this operation.
